resources.string: Use your fingerprint or face to unlock Monica
No biometric enrolled. Please set up fingerprint or face in system settings
Are you sure you want to logout?
Base32-encoded secret key, usually shown below QR code

1. Find "Two-Factor Authentication" settings on the website
2. Choose "Use authenticator app"
3. Copy the displayed secret key or scan QR code
4. Paste the key in the input box above
Click the + button in the bottom right to add your first bank card
Show or hide this tab in the bottom bar
Use the arrows to reorder the tabs. Settings always stays at the end.
Choose which tabs appear and reorder them
Click the + button in the bottom right to add your first document
All document information and photos are encrypted and stored locally on your device
Click the + button in the bottom right to add an authenticator
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"? This action cannot be undone.
Scanning QR codes requires camera access. Please grant camera permission to continue.
Camera permission is required to take photos
CSV file is not encrypted, please keep the exported file safe
Export all passwords, TOTP, bank cards, and documents in CSV format
Export only password entries in CSV format
Export TOTP authenticators in CSV or Aegis-compatible format
Export bank cards and documents together in CSV format
Protect your TOTP data with a password (Aegis-compatible)
This password will be required when importing the file
Importing data may overwrite existing data. Please make sure to backup your current data before importing.
Supports CSV files exported by the app and Alipay transaction details
Imported data will be added to existing data, current data will not be deleted
Monica Password Manager is completely free and open-source software, with no mandatory fees. All features are available for free.
üôè If you find this app helpful
Feel free to support the author\'s continued development through the following ways:
Your support is my motivation to keep developing!
Thank you for using Monica Password Manager!
Hope it brings security and convenience to your digital life.
Storage permission is required to save images
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"?
Master password must be at least 6 characters long
Password must be at least 6 digits
Please enter your current password and set a new numeric password (minimum 6 digits)
Please set your new numeric password (minimum 6 digits)
Your master password has been successfully changed. Please remember your new password.
Password must be at least 6 characters
This will permanently delete all your saved passwords and reset the application. This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to reset all data?
All data has been reset. You can now set up a new master password.
Set up security questions to recover your password if you forget it. These questions will help verify your identity.
Please select the first security question
Please select the second security question
Please provide an answer to the first question
Please provide an answer to the second question
Please answer your security questions to reset your password
Too many incorrect attempts. Please contact support or use the complete reset option.
Tap the + button to create your first secure note
Are you sure you want to delete "%s"? This action cannot be undone.
The note you\'re looking for may have been deleted or moved.
Set security questions for password recovery
After changing the master password, all saved data will be re-encrypted with the new password. Please make sure you can remember the new password, otherwise you will not be able to access your data.
Password must be at least 6 digits
Your master password has been successfully changed and all data has been re-encrypted with the new password. Please login with the new password.
New password must be at least 6 digits
New password cannot be the same as current password
Set up security questions to recover your password if you forget it. These questions will help verify your identity.
Security questions have been successfully set up. You can use these questions to recover your password if you forget it.
Please select the first security question
Please select the second security question
Please select the third security question
Please provide an answer to the first question
Please provide an answer to the second question
Please provide an answer to the third question
What is your mother\'s maiden name?
What was the name of your first pet?
What city were you born in?
What was the name of your elementary school?
What is the name of your best friend from childhood?
If you find this app helpful, please consider supporting the author. Your support is the biggest motivation for us to keep improving!
Thank you for using Monica Password Manager. Your support means a lot!

Delete all passwords, authenticators, bank cards and documents
This will permanently delete all passwords, authenticators, bank cards and documents, and cannot be recovered.\n\nIt is recommended to export a backup before clearing!
